manifest.name: action.jira.APPLICATION_PROPERTIES_ADVANCED_SETTINGS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the application properties that are accessible on the Advanced Settings page. To navigate to the Advanced Settings page in Jira, choose the Jira icon > Jira settings > System, General Configuration and then click Advanced Settings (in the upper right).

manifest.name: action.jira.APPLICATION_PROPERTIES_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all application properties or a single application property.

manifest.name: action.jira.APPLICATION_PROPERTIES_ID_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Changes the value of an application property. For example, you can change the value of the jira.clone.prefix from its default value of CLONE - to Clone - if you prefer sentence case capitalization. Editable properties are described below along with their default values.

manifest.name: action.jira.APPLICATIONROLE_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all application roles. In Jira, application roles are managed using the Application access configuration page.

manifest.name: action.jira.APPLICATIONROLE_KEY_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns an application role.

manifest.name: action.jira.ATTACHMENT_ID_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes an attachment from an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ATTACHMENT_ID_EXPAND_HUMAN_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the metadata for the contents of an attachment, if it is an archive, and metadata for the attachment itself. For example, if the attachment is a ZIP archive, then information about the files in the archive is returned and metadata for the ZIP archive. Currently, only the ZIP archive format is supported.

manifest.name: action.jira.ATTACHMENT_ID_EXPAND_RAW_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the metadata for the contents of an attachment, if it is an archive. For example, if the attachment is a ZIP archive, then information about the files in the archive is returned. Currently, only the ZIP archive format is supported.

manifest.name: action.jira.ATTACHMENT_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the metadata for an attachment. Note that the attachment itself is not returned.

manifest.name: action.jira.ATTACHMENT_META_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the global attachment settings, that is, whether attachments are enabled and the maximum attachment size allowed.

manifest.name: action.jira.AUDITING_RECORD_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of audit records. The list can be filtered to include items:

manifest.name: action.jira.AVATAR_TYPE_SYSTEM_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of system avatar details by owner type, where the owner types are issue type, project, or user.

manifest.name: action.jira.COMMENT_COMMENT_ID_PROPERTIES_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the keys of all the properties of a comment.

manifest.name: action.jira.COMMENT_COMMENT_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete comment comment id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: delete comment comment id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a comment property.

manifest.name: action.jira.COMMENT_COMMENT_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_GET
manifest.displayName: get comment comment id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: get comment comment id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Returns the value of a comment property.

manifest.name: action.jira.COMMENT_COMMENT_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_PUT
manifest.displayName: put comment comment id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: put comment comment id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Creates or updates the value of a property for a comment. Use this resource to store custom data against a comment.

manifest.name: action.jira.COMMENT_LIST_POST
manifest.longDescription: Returns the comments for a list of comment IDs.

manifest.name: action.jira.COMPONENT_ID_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a component. Permissions required: Any of the following:

manifest.name: action.jira.COMPONENT_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a component. Permissions required: Browse projects project permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.COMPONENT_ID_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Modifies a component. Any fields included in the request are overwritten. If leadUserName is an empty string (\"\") the component lead is removed. Permissions required: Any of the following:

manifest.name: action.jira.COMPONENT_ID_RELATED_ISSUE_COUNTS_GET
manifest.displayName: get component id related issue counts
manifest.shortDescription: get component id related issue counts
manifest.longDescription: Returns the counts of issues assigned to the component. Permissions required: Permission to access Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.COMPONENT_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a component. Use components to provide containers for issues within a project. Permissions required: Any of the following:

manifest.name: action.jira.CONFIGURATION_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the global settings in Jira. These settings determine whether optional features (for example, sub-tasks, time tracking, and others) are enabled. If time tracking is enabled, this method also returns the time tracking configuration.

manifest.name: action.jira.CONFIGURATION_TIMETRACKING_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Disables time tracking.

manifest.name: action.jira.CONFIGURATION_TIMETRACKING_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the time tracking provider that is currently selected. Note that if time tracking is disabled, then a successful but empty response is returned.

manifest.name: action.jira.CONFIGURATION_TIMETRACKING_LIST_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all time tracking providers. By default, Jira only has one time tracking provider: JIRA provided time tracking. However, you can install other time tracking providers via apps from the Atlassian Marketplace. For more information on time tracking providers, see the documentation for the Time Tracking Provider module.

manifest.name: action.jira.CONFIGURATION_TIMETRACKING_OPTIONS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the time tracking settings. This includes settings such as the time format, default time unit, and others. For more information, see Configuring time tracking.

manifest.name: action.jira.CONFIGURATION_TIMETRACKING_OPTIONS_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets the time tracking settings.

manifest.name: action.jira.CONFIGURATION_TIMETRACKING_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Selects a time tracking provider.

manifest.name: action.jira.CUSTOM_FIELD_OPTION_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a custom field option. For example, an option in a cascading select list.

manifest.name: action.jira.DASHBOARD_DASHBOARD_ID_ITEMS_ITEM_ID_PROPERTIES_GET
manifest.displayName: get dashboard dashboard id items item id properties
manifest.shortDescription: get dashboard dashboard id items item id properties
manifest.longDescription: Returns the keys of all properties for a dashboard item.

manifest.name: action.jira.DASHBOARD_DASHBOARD_ID_ITEMS_ITEM_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete dashboard dashboard id items item id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: delete dashboard dashboard id items item id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a dashboard item property.

manifest.name: action.jira.DASHBOARD_DASHBOARD_ID_ITEMS_ITEM_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_GET
manifest.displayName: get dashboard dashboard id items item id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: get dashboard dashboard id items item id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Returns the key and value of a dashboard item property.

manifest.name: action.jira.DASHBOARD_DASHBOARD_ID_ITEMS_ITEM_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_PUT
manifest.displayName: put dashboard dashboard id items item id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: put dashboard dashboard id items item id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Sets the value of a dashboard item property. Use this resource in apps to store custom data against a dashboard item.

manifest.name: action.jira.DASHBOARD_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of dashboards owned by or shared with the user. The list may be filtered to include only favorite or owned dashboards.

manifest.name: action.jira.DASHBOARD_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a dashboard.

manifest.name: action.jira.EXPRESSION_EVAL_POST
manifest.longDescription: Evaluates a Jira expression and returns its value.

manifest.name: action.jira.FIELD_FIELD_KEY_OPTION_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all options defined for a select list issue field. A select list issue field is a type of issue field that allows a user to select an value from a list of options.

manifest.name: action.jira.FIELD_FIELD_KEY_OPTION_OPTION_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete field field key option option id
manifest.shortDescription: delete field field key option option id
manifest.longDescription: Deletes an option from a select list issue field.

manifest.name: action.jira.FIELD_FIELD_KEY_OPTION_OPTION_ID_GET
manifest.displayName: get field field key option option id
manifest.shortDescription: get field field key option option id
manifest.longDescription: Returns an option from a select list issue field.

manifest.name: action.jira.FIELD_FIELD_KEY_OPTION_OPTION_ID_ISSUE_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete field field key option option id issue
manifest.shortDescription: delete field field key option option id issue
manifest.longDescription: Deselects a select list issue field option in all issues that it has been selected in. A different option can be selected to replace the deselected option. The update can also be limited to a smaller set of issues by using a JQL query.

manifest.name: action.jira.FIELD_FIELD_KEY_OPTION_OPTION_ID_PUT
manifest.displayName: put field field key option option id
manifest.shortDescription: put field field key option option id
manifest.longDescription: Updates an option for a select list issue field. If the option does not exist, a new option is created.

manifest.name: action.jira.FIELD_FIELD_KEY_OPTION_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates an option for a select list issue field.

manifest.name: action.jira.FIELD_FIELD_KEY_OPTION_SUGGESTIONS_EDIT_GET
manifest.displayName: get field field key option suggestions edit
manifest.shortDescription: get field field key option suggestions edit
manifest.longDescription: Returns options defined for a select list issue field that can be viewed and selected by the currently logged in user.

manifest.name: action.jira.FIELD_FIELD_KEY_OPTION_SUGGESTIONS_SEARCH_GET
manifest.displayName: get field field key option suggestions search
manifest.shortDescription: get field field key option suggestions search
manifest.longDescription: Returns options defined for a select list issue field that can be viewed by the currently logged in user.

manifest.name: action.jira.FIELD_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all issue fields in Jira, both system and custom fields.

manifest.name: action.jira.FIELD_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a custom field.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_DEFAULT_SHARE_SCOPE_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the default sharing settings for new filters and dashboards for a user. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira (i.e., member of the users group).

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_DEFAULT_SHARE_SCOPE_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets the default sharing for new filters and dashboards for a user. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira (i.e., member of the users group).

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_FAVOURITE_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the favorite filters of the calling user. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira (i.e., member of the users group).

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all filters. Deprecated, use Search for filters that supports search and pagination. Permissions required: None, however only the following filters are returned:

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_COLUMNS_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Reset the user's column configuration for the filter to the default. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira (i.e., member of the users group) and permission to view the filter.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_COLUMNS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the columns configured for a filter. The column configuration is used when the filter's results are viewed in List View with the Columns set to Filter. Permissions required: None, however the calling user must have permission to view the filter.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_COLUMNS_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets the columns for a filter. Only navigable fields can be set as columns. Use Get fields to get the list fields in Jira. A navigable field has navigable set to true. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira (i.e., member of the users group) and permission to view the filter.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Delete a filter. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira, however the following rules govern what a user can delete:

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_FAVOURITE_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Removes a filter as a favorite for the calling user. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira (i.e., member of the users group) and permission to view the filter.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_FAVOURITE_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Add a filter as a favorite for the calling user. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira (i.e., member of the users group) and permission to view the filter.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a filter. Permissions required: None, however the calling user must have permission view the filter.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_PERMISSION_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the share permissions for a filter. A filter can be shared with groups, projects, all logged-in users, or the public. Sharing with all logged-in users or the public is known as a global share permission. Permissions required: None, however the calling user must have permission to view the filter.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_PERMISSION_PERMISSION_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete filter id permission permission id
manifest.shortDescription: delete filter id permission permission id
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a share permission from a filter. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira (i.e., member of the users group) and the calling user must own the filter.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_PERMISSION_PERMISSION_ID_GET
manifest.displayName: get filter id permission permission id
manifest.shortDescription: get filter id permission permission id
manifest.longDescription: Returns a share permission for a filter. A filter can be shared with groups, projects, all logged-in users, or the public. Sharing with all logged-in users or the public is known as a global share permission. Permissions required: None, however the calling user must have permission to view the filter.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_PERMISSION_POST
manifest.longDescription: Add a share permissions to a filter. If you add a global share permission (i.e., all logged-in users or the public) it will overwrite all share permissions for the filter.Be aware that this method uses different objects for updating share permissions compared to Update filter. Permissions required: Share dashboards and filters global permission and the calling user must own the filter.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_ID_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Updates an existing filter. Use this method to update a filter's name, description, JQL, or sharing. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira, however the following rules govern what a user can update:

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_MY_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the filters owned by the calling user. If includeFavourites is true, the user's favorite filters are also returned. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira (i.e., member of the users group).

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a new filter. The new filter is not shared and not selected as a favorite. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.FILTER_SEARCH_GET
manifest.longDescription: Search for filters. This method is similar to Get filters except that you can refine the results to include filters that have specific attributes. For example, filters with a particular name. Permissions required: None, however only the following filters are returned (if no search parameters are set):

manifest.name: action.jira.GROUP_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a group.

manifest.name: action.jira.GROUP_GET
manifest.longDescription: This resource is deprecated, use group/member.

manifest.name: action.jira.GROUP_MEMBER_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all users in a group. Users are ordered by username.

manifest.name: action.jira.GROUP_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a group.

manifest.name: action.jira.GROUP_USER_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Removes a user from a group. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.GROUP_USER_POST
manifest.longDescription: Adds a user to a group.

manifest.name: action.jira.GROUPS_PICKER_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of groups whose names contain a query string. A list of group names can be provided to exclude groups from the results.

manifest.name: action.jira.GROUPUSERPICKER_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of users and groups matching a string. The string is used:

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_BULK_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates issues and, where the option to create sub-tasks is enabled in Jira, sub-tasks. Transitions may be applied, to move the issues or sub-tasks to a workflow step other than the default start step, and issue properties set.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_CREATEMETA_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns details of projects, issue types within projects, and, when requested, the create screen fields for each issue type for the user. Use the information to populate the requests in Create issue and Create issues.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_ASSIGNEE_PUT
manifest.displayName: put issue issue id or key assignee
manifest.shortDescription: put issue issue id or key assignee
manifest.longDescription: Assigns an issue to a user. Use this operation when the calling user does not have the Edit Issues permission but has the Assign issue permission for the project that the issue is in.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_ATTACHMENTS_POST
manifest.displayName: post issue issue id or key attachments
manifest.shortDescription: post issue issue id or key attachments
manifest.longDescription: Adds one or more attachments to an issue. Attachments are posted as multipart/form-data (RFC 1867).

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_CHANGELOG_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key changelog
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key changelog
manifest.longDescription: Returns a paginated list of all updates of an issue, sorted by date, starting from the oldest.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_COMMENT_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key comment
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key comment
manifest.longDescription: to get comments for

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_COMMENT_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete issue issue id or key comment id
manifest.shortDescription: delete issue issue id or key comment id
manifest.longDescription: a string containing the issue id or key the comment belongs to

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_COMMENT_ID_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key comment id
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key comment id
manifest.longDescription: of the issue the comment belongs to

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_COMMENT_ID_PUT
manifest.displayName: put issue issue id or key comment id
manifest.shortDescription: put issue issue id or key comment id
manifest.longDescription: a string containing the issue id or key the comment belongs to

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_COMMENT_POST
manifest.displayName: post issue issue id or key comment
manifest.shortDescription: post issue issue id or key comment
manifest.longDescription: a string containing the issue id or key the comment will be added to

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete issue issue id or key
manifest.shortDescription: delete issue issue id or key
manifest.longDescription: Deletes an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_EDITMETA_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key editmeta
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key editmeta
manifest.longDescription: Returns the edit screen fields for an issue that are visible to and editable by the user. Use the information to populate the requests in Edit issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key
manifest.longDescription: Returns the details for an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_NOTIFY_POST
manifest.displayName: post issue issue id or key notify
manifest.shortDescription: post issue issue id or key notify
manifest.longDescription: Creates an email notification for an issue and adds it to the mail queue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_PROPERTIES_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key properties
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key properties
manifest.longDescription: Returns the URIs and keys of an issue's properties.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete issue issue id or key properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: delete issue issue id or key properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Deletes an issue's property.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Returns the key and value of an issue's property.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_PUT
manifest.displayName: put issue issue id or key properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: put issue issue id or key properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Sets the value of an issue's property. Use this resource to store custom data against an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_PUT
manifest.displayName: put issue issue id or key
manifest.shortDescription: put issue issue id or key
manifest.longDescription: Edits an issue. A transition may be applied and issue properties updated as part of the edit.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_REMOTELINK_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete issue issue id or key remotelink
manifest.shortDescription: delete issue issue id or key remotelink
manifest.longDescription: Deletes the remote issue link from the issue using the link's global ID.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_REMOTELINK_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key remotelink
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key remotelink
manifest.longDescription: Returns the remote issue links for an issue. When a remote issue link global ID is provided the record with that global ID is returned, otherwise all remote issue links are returned.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_REMOTELINK_LINK_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete issue issue id or key remotelink link id
manifest.shortDescription: delete issue issue id or key remotelink link id
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a remote issue link from an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_REMOTELINK_LINK_ID_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key remotelink link id
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key remotelink link id
manifest.longDescription: Returns a remote issue link for an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_REMOTELINK_LINK_ID_PUT
manifest.displayName: put issue issue id or key remotelink link id
manifest.shortDescription: put issue issue id or key remotelink link id
manifest.longDescription: Updates a remote issue link for an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_REMOTELINK_POST
manifest.displayName: post issue issue id or key remotelink
manifest.shortDescription: post issue issue id or key remotelink
manifest.longDescription: Creates or updates a remote issue link for an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_TRANSITIONS_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key transitions
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key transitions
manifest.longDescription: Returns either all transitions or a transition that can be performed by the user on an issue, based on the issue's status.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_TRANSITIONS_POST
manifest.displayName: post issue issue id or key transitions
manifest.shortDescription: post issue issue id or key transitions
manifest.longDescription: Performs an issue transition and, if the transition has a screen, updates the fields from the transition screen. Optionally, issue properties can be set.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_VOTES_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete issue issue id or key votes
manifest.shortDescription: delete issue issue id or key votes
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a user's vote from an issue. This is the equivalent of the user clicking Unvote on an issue in Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_VOTES_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key votes
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key votes
manifest.longDescription: Returns details about the votes on an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_VOTES_POST
manifest.displayName: post issue issue id or key votes
manifest.shortDescription: post issue issue id or key votes
manifest.longDescription: Adds the user's vote to an issue. This is the equivalent of the user clicking Vote on an issue in Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WATCHERS_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete issue issue id or key watchers
manifest.shortDescription: delete issue issue id or key watchers
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a user as a watcher of an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WATCHERS_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key watchers
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key watchers
manifest.longDescription: Returns the watchers for an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WATCHERS_POST
manifest.displayName: post issue issue id or key watchers
manifest.shortDescription: post issue issue id or key watchers
manifest.longDescription: Adds a user as a watcher of an issue. If no user is specified the calling user is added.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WORKLOG_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key worklog
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key worklog
manifest.longDescription: Returns all worklogs for an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WORKLOG_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete issue issue id or key worklog id
manifest.shortDescription: delete issue issue id or key worklog id
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a worklog from an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WORKLOG_ID_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key worklog id
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key worklog id
manifest.longDescription: Returns a worklog.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WORKLOG_ID_PUT
manifest.displayName: put issue issue id or key worklog id
manifest.shortDescription: put issue issue id or key worklog id
manifest.longDescription: Updates a worklog.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WORKLOG_POST
manifest.displayName: post issue issue id or key worklog
manifest.shortDescription: post issue issue id or key worklog
manifest.longDescription: Adds a worklog to an issue.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WORKLOG_WORKLOG_ID_PROPERTIES_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key worklog worklog id properties
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key worklog worklog id properties
manifest.longDescription: Returns the keys of all properties for a worklog.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WORKLOG_WORKLOG_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete issue issue id or key worklog worklog id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: delete issue issue id or key worklog worklog id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a worklog property.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WORKLOG_WORKLOG_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue issue id or key worklog worklog id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: get issue issue id or key worklog worklog id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Returns the value of a worklog property.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_ISSUE_ID_OR_KEY_WORKLOG_WORKLOG_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_PUT
manifest.displayName: put issue issue id or key worklog worklog id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: put issue issue id or key worklog worklog id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Sets the value of a worklog property. Use this operation to store custom data against the worklog.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_LINK_LINK_ID_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes an issue link.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_LINK_LINK_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns an issue link.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_LINK_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a link between two issues. Use this operation to indicate a relationship between two issues and optionally add a comment to the from (outward) issue. To use this resource the site must have Issue Linking enabled.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_LINK_TYPE_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of all issue link types.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_LINK_TYPE_ISSUE_LINK_TYPE_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete issue link type issue link type id
manifest.shortDescription: delete issue link type issue link type id
manifest.longDescription: Deletes an issue link type.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_LINK_TYPE_ISSUE_LINK_TYPE_ID_GET
manifest.displayName: get issue link type issue link type id
manifest.shortDescription: get issue link type issue link type id
manifest.longDescription: Returns an issue link type.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_LINK_TYPE_ISSUE_LINK_TYPE_ID_PUT
manifest.displayName: put issue link type issue link type id
manifest.shortDescription: put issue link type issue link type id
manifest.longDescription: Updates an issue link type.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_LINK_TYPE_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates an issue link type. Use this operation to create descriptions of the reasons why issues are linked. The issue link type consists of a name and descriptions for a link's inward and outward relationships.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_PICKER_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of suggested issues matching the auto-completion query for the user executing this request. This operation checks the user's history and browsing context to return issue suggestions.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates an issue or, where the option to create sub-tasks is enabled in Jira, a sub-task. A transition may be applied, to move the issue or sub-task to a workflow step other than the default start step, and issue properties set.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a property value from multiple issues. The issues to be updated can be specified by filter criteria.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUE_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets a property value on multiple issues. The issues to be updated can be specified by a filter.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUESECURITYSCHEMES_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all issue security schemes.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUESECURITYSCHEMES_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns an issue security scheme along with its security levels.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUETYPE_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all issue types. Permissions required: Permission to access Jira, however, only issue types that are visible to the user are returned.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUETYPE_ID_ALTERNATIVES_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of issue types that can be used to replace the issue type. The alternative issue types are those assigned to the same workflow scheme, field configuration scheme, and screen scheme. Permissions required: Permission to access Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUETYPE_ID_AVATAR2_POST
manifest.longDescription: Loads an avatar for the issue type.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUETYPE_ID_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes the issue type. If the issue type is in use, all uses are updated with the alternative issue type (alternativeIssueTypeId). A list of alternative issue types can be obtained from the Get alternative issue types resource. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUETYPE_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns an issue type. Permissions required:

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUETYPE_ID_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Updates the issue type. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUETYPE_ISSUE_TYPE_ID_PROPERTIES_GET
manifest.displayName: get issuetype issue type id properties
manifest.shortDescription: get issuetype issue type id properties
manifest.longDescription: Returns all the issue type property keys of the issue type. Permissions required:

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUETYPE_ISSUE_TYPE_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete issuetype issue type id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: delete issuetype issue type id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Deletes the issue type property. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUETYPE_ISSUE_TYPE_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_GET
manifest.displayName: get issuetype issue type id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: get issuetype issue type id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Returns the key and value of the issue type property. Permissions required:

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUETYPE_ISSUE_TYPE_ID_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_PUT
manifest.displayName: put issuetype issue type id properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: put issuetype issue type id properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Creates or updates the value of the issue type property. Use this resource to store and update data against an issue type. The value of the request body must be a valid, non-empty JSON blob. The maximum length of the property value is 32768 bytes. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.ISSUETYPE_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates an issue type and adds it to the default issue type scheme. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.JQL_AUTOCOMPLETEDATA_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns reference data for JQL searches. This is a downloadable version of the documentation provided in Advanced searching - fields reference and Advanced searching - functions reference, along with a list of JQL-reserved words. Use this information to assist with the programmatic creation of JQL queries or the validation of queries built in a custom query builder.

manifest.name: action.jira.JQL_AUTOCOMPLETEDATA_SUGGESTIONS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the JQL search auto complete suggestions for a field.

manifest.name: action.jira.JQL_PDCLEANER_POST
manifest.longDescription: The query strings having personal data that need to be migrated. There should be at most 100 queries.

manifest.name: action.jira.MYPERMISSIONS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of permissions indicating which permissions the user has. Details of the user's permissions can be obtained in a global, project, or issue context.

manifest.name: action.jira.MYPREFERENCES_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a preference of the user, which restores the default value of system defined settings.

manifest.name: action.jira.MYPREFERENCES_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the value of a preference of the user.

manifest.name: action.jira.MYPREFERENCES_LOCALE_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes the locale of the current user, which restores the default setting.

manifest.name: action.jira.MYPREFERENCES_LOCALE_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the locale for the current user.

manifest.name: action.jira.MYPREFERENCES_LOCALE_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets the locale of the current user. The requested locale must be one supported by the instance of Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.MYPREFERENCES_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Creates a preference for the user or updates its value. An arbitrary preference can be created with the value containing up to 255 characters. In addition, the following keys define system preferences that can be set or created:

manifest.name: action.jira.MYSELF_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns details for the authenticated user.

manifest.name: action.jira.NOTIFICATIONSCHEME_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a paginated list of notification schemes in order by display name.

manifest.name: action.jira.NOTIFICATIONSCHEME_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a notification scheme, including the list of events and the recipients who will receive notifications for those events.

manifest.name: action.jira.PERMISSIONS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all permissions, including:

manifest.name: action.jira.PERMISSIONS_PROJECT_POST
manifest.longDescription: Returns all the projects where the user is granted a list of project permissions.

manifest.name: action.jira.PERMISSIONSCHEME_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all permission schemes.

manifest.name: action.jira.PERMISSIONSCHEME_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a new permission scheme. You can create a permission scheme with or without defining a set of permission grants. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.PERMISSIONSCHEME_SCHEME_ID_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a permission scheme. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.PERMISSIONSCHEME_SCHEME_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a permission scheme. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.PERMISSIONSCHEME_SCHEME_ID_PERMISSION_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all permission grants for a permission scheme. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.PERMISSIONSCHEME_SCHEME_ID_PERMISSION_PERMISSION_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete permissionscheme scheme id permission permission id
manifest.shortDescription: delete permissionscheme scheme id permission permission id
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a permission grant from a permission scheme. See About permission schemes and grants for more details. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.PERMISSIONSCHEME_SCHEME_ID_PERMISSION_PERMISSION_ID_GET
manifest.displayName: get permissionscheme scheme id permission permission id
manifest.shortDescription: get permissionscheme scheme id permission permission id
manifest.longDescription: Returns a permission grant. Permissions required: Permission to log in to Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.PERMISSIONSCHEME_SCHEME_ID_PERMISSION_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a new permission grant in the given permission scheme. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.PERMISSIONSCHEME_SCHEME_ID_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Updates a permission scheme. Below are some important things to note when using this resource:

manifest.name: action.jira.PRIORITY_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the list of all issue priorities.

manifest.name: action.jira.PRIORITY_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns an issue priority.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_CATEGORY_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all project categories.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_CATEGORY_ID_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a project category.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_CATEGORY_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a project category.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_CATEGORY_ID_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Updates a project category.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_CATEGORY_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a project category.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all projects visible to the currently logged in user. Deprecated, use Get projects paginated that supports search and pagination. For projects to be visible, the authenticated user must be granted either Browse projects or Administer projects permissions. If no user is logged in, it returns all projects that are visible for anonymous users.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a new project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_AVATAR2_POST
manifest.displayName: post project project id or key avatar2
manifest.shortDescription: post project project id or key avatar2
manifest.longDescription: Loads an avatar for a project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_AVATAR_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete project project id or key avatar id
manifest.shortDescription: delete project project id or key avatar id
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a custom avatar from a project. Note that system avatars cannot be deleted.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_AVATAR_PUT
manifest.displayName: put project project id or key avatar
manifest.shortDescription: put project project id or key avatar
manifest.longDescription: Sets the avatar displayed for a project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_AVATARS_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key avatars
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key avatars
manifest.longDescription: Returns all project avatars, grouped by system and custom avatars.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_COMPONENT_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key component
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key component
manifest.longDescription: Returns a paginated representation of all components existing in a single project. See the Get project components resource if you want to get a full list of versions without pagination.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_COMPONENTS_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key components
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key components
manifest.longDescription: Returns all components existing in a single project. See the Get project components paginated resource if you want to get a full list of components with pagination.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete project project id or key
manifest.shortDescription: delete project project id or key
manifest.longDescription: Deletes an existing project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key
manifest.longDescription: Returns the project details for the specified project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_PROPERTIES_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key properties
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key properties
manifest.longDescription: Returns all project property keys for the project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete project project id or key properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: delete project project id or key properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Removes the property from the project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Returns the value of the project property.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_PUT
manifest.displayName: put project project id or key properties property key
manifest.shortDescription: put project project id or key properties property key
manifest.longDescription: Sets the value of the project property. You can use project properties to store custom data against the project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_PUT
manifest.displayName: put project project id or key
manifest.shortDescription: put project project id or key
manifest.longDescription: Updates the project details of an existing project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_ROLE_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key role
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key role
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of project roles for the project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_ROLE_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete project project id or key role id
manifest.shortDescription: delete project project id or key role id
manifest.longDescription: Deletes actors from a project role for the project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_ROLE_ID_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key role id
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key role id
manifest.longDescription: Returns the project role's details and actors associated with the project. The list of actors is sorted by display name.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_ROLE_ID_POST
manifest.displayName: post project project id or key role id
manifest.shortDescription: post project project id or key role id
manifest.longDescription: Adds additional actors to a project role for the project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_ROLE_ID_PUT
manifest.displayName: put project project id or key role id
manifest.shortDescription: put project project id or key role id
manifest.longDescription: Associates actors with the project role for the project, replacing all existing actors.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_ROLEDETAILS_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key roledetails
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key roledetails
manifest.longDescription: Returns all project roles and the details for each role. Note that the list of project roles is common to all projects.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_STATUSES_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key statuses
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key statuses
manifest.longDescription: Returns the valid statuses for a project. The statuses are grouped by issue type, as each project has a set of valid issue types and each issue type has a set of valid statuses.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_TYPE_NEW_PROJECT_TYPE_KEY_PUT
manifest.displayName: put project project id or key type new project type key
manifest.shortDescription: put project project id or key type new project type key
manifest.longDescription: Updates the project type.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_VERSION_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key version
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key version
manifest.longDescription: Returns a paginated representation of all versions existing in a single project. See the Get project versions resource if you want to get a full list of versions without pagination.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_ID_OR_KEY_VERSIONS_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project id or key versions
manifest.shortDescription: get project project id or key versions
manifest.longDescription: Returns all versions existing in a single project. The response is not paginated. Use Get project versions paginated if you want to get the versions in a project with pagination.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_KEY_OR_ID_ISSUESECURITYLEVELSCHEME_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project key or id issuesecuritylevelscheme
manifest.shortDescription: get project project key or id issuesecuritylevelscheme
manifest.longDescription: Returns the issue security scheme associated with the project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_KEY_OR_ID_NOTIFICATIONSCHEME_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project key or id notificationscheme
manifest.shortDescription: get project project key or id notificationscheme
manifest.longDescription: Gets a notification scheme associated with the project. See the Get notification scheme resource for more information about notification schemes.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_KEY_OR_ID_PERMISSIONSCHEME_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project key or id permissionscheme
manifest.shortDescription: get project project key or id permissionscheme
manifest.longDescription: Gets the permission scheme associated with the project.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_KEY_OR_ID_PERMISSIONSCHEME_PUT
manifest.displayName: put project project key or id permissionscheme
manifest.shortDescription: put project project key or id permissionscheme
manifest.longDescription: Associates a permission scheme with a particular project. See Managing project permissions for more information about permission schemes.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_PROJECT_KEY_OR_ID_SECURITYLEVEL_GET
manifest.displayName: get project project key or id securitylevel
manifest.shortDescription: get project project key or id securitylevel
manifest.longDescription: Returns all issue security levels for the project that the currently authenticated user has access to. If the user does not have permission to see an issue security level, then that level is not returned. If the user lacks the Set Issue Security permission, then an empty list is returned.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_SEARCH_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns projects visible to the currently logged in user. For projects to be visible, the authenticated user must be granted either Browse projects or Administer projects permissions. If no user is logged in, then all projects visible to anonymous users are returned.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_TYPE_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all project types, whether or not the instance has a valid license for each type.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_TYPE_PROJECT_TYPE_KEY_ACCESSIBLE_GET
manifest.displayName: get project type project type key accessible
manifest.shortDescription: get project type project type key accessible
manifest.longDescription: Returns a project type if it is accessible to the logged in user.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECT_TYPE_PROJECT_TYPE_KEY_GET
manifest.displayName: get project type project type key
manifest.shortDescription: get project type project type key
manifest.longDescription: Returns a project type.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECTVALIDATE_KEY_GET
manifest.longDescription: Validates a project key by confirming the key is a valid string and not in use.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECTVALIDATE_VALID_PROJECT_KEY_GET
manifest.longDescription: Validates a project key and, if the key is invalid or in use, generates a valid random string for the project key.

manifest.name: action.jira.PROJECTVALIDATE_VALID_PROJECT_NAME_GET
manifest.longDescription: Checks that a project name isn't in use. If the name isn't in use, the passed string is returned. If the name is in use, this operation attempts to generate a valid project name based on the one supplied, usually by adding a sequence number. If a valid project name cannot be generated, a 404 response is returned.

manifest.name: action.jira.RESOLUTION_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of all issue resolution values.

manifest.name: action.jira.RESOLUTION_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns an issue resolution value.

manifest.name: action.jira.ROLE_GET
manifest.longDescription: Gets a list of all project roles, complete with project role details and default actors.

manifest.name: action.jira.ROLE_ID_ACTORS_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Removes default actors from the project role. You may remove either a group or user, but you cannot remove a group and a user in the same request.

manifest.name: action.jira.ROLE_ID_ACTORS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the default actors for the project role.

manifest.name: action.jira.ROLE_ID_ACTORS_POST
manifest.longDescription: Adds default actors to the given role. You may add either groups or users, but you cannot add groups and users in the same request.

manifest.name: action.jira.ROLE_ID_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a project role. You must specify a replacement project role if you wish to delete a project role that is in use.

manifest.name: action.jira.ROLE_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Gets the project role details and the default actors associated with the role. The list of default actors is sorted by display name.

manifest.name: action.jira.ROLE_ID_POST
manifest.longDescription: Update either the project role's name or its description.

manifest.name: action.jira.ROLE_ID_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Update the project role's name and description. You must include both a name and a description in the request.

manifest.name: action.jira.ROLE_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a new project role with no default actors. You can use the Add default actors to project role the project method to add default actors to the project role after creating it.

manifest.name: action.jira.SCREENS_ADD_TO_DEFAULT_FIELD_ID_POST
manifest.displayName: post screens add to default field id
manifest.shortDescription: post screens add to default field id
manifest.longDescription: Adds a field to the default tab of the default screen.

manifest.name: action.jira.SCREENS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all screens.

manifest.displayName: get screens screen id available fields
manifest.shortDescription: get screens screen id available fields

manifest.name: action.jira.SCREENS_SCREEN_ID_TABS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the list of tabs for a screen.

manifest.name: action.jira.SCREENS_SCREEN_ID_TABS_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a tab for a screen.

manifest.name: action.jira.SCREENS_SCREEN_ID_TABS_TAB_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete screens screen id tabs tab id

manifest.displayName: get screens screen id tabs tab id fields
manifest.shortDescription: get screens screen id tabs tab id fields

manifest.name: action.jira.SCREENS_SCREEN_ID_TABS_TAB_ID_FIELDS_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete screens screen id tabs tab id fields id
manifest.shortDescription: delete screens screen id tabs tab id fields id
manifest.longDescription: Removes a field from a screen tab.

manifest.name: action.jira.SCREENS_SCREEN_ID_TABS_TAB_ID_FIELDS_ID_MOVE_POST
manifest.displayName: post screens screen id tabs tab id fields id move

manifest.name: action.jira.SCREENS_SCREEN_ID_TABS_TAB_ID_FIELDS_POST
manifest.displayName: post screens screen id tabs tab id fields
manifest.shortDescription: post screens screen id tabs tab id fields
manifest.longDescription: Adds a field to a screen tab.

manifest.name: action.jira.SCREENS_SCREEN_ID_TABS_TAB_ID_MOVE_POS_POST
manifest.displayName: post screens screen id tabs tab id move pos
manifest.shortDescription: post screens screen id tabs tab id move pos

manifest.displayName: put screens screen id tabs tab id
manifest.shortDescription: put screens screen id tabs tab id
manifest.longDescription: Updates the name of a screen tab.

manifest.name: action.jira.SEARCH_GET
manifest.longDescription: Searches for issues using JQL. Permissions required: Permission to access Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.SEARCH_POST
manifest.longDescription: Searches for issues using JQL. Permissions required: Permission to access Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.SECURITYLEVEL_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns details of an issue security level.

manifest.name: action.jira.SERVER_INFO_GET

manifest.name: action.jira.SETTINGS_COLUMNS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the default issue navigator columns.

manifest.name: action.jira.SETTINGS_COLUMNS_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets the default issue navigator columns.

manifest.name: action.jira.STATUS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of all statuses associated with workflows.

manifest.name: action.jira.STATUS_ID_OR_NAME_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a status. The status must be associated with a workflow to be returned.

manifest.name: action.jira.STATUSCATEGORY_GET

manifest.name: action.jira.STATUSCATEGORY_ID_OR_KEY_GET

manifest.name: action.jira.TASK_TASK_ID_CANCEL_POST

manifest.name: action.jira.TASK_TASK_ID_GET

manifest.name: action.jira.UNIVERSAL_AVATAR_TYPE_TYPE_OWNER_ENTITY_ID_GET
manifest.displayName: get universal avatar type type owner entity id
manifest.shortDescription: get universal avatar type type owner entity id

manifest.name: action.jira.UNIVERSAL_AVATAR_TYPE_TYPE_OWNER_ENTITY_ID_POST
manifest.displayName: post universal avatar type type owner entity id
manifest.shortDescription: post universal avatar type type owner entity id

manifest.displayName: delete universal avatar type type owner owning object id avatar id
manifest.shortDescription: delete universal avatar type type owner owning object id avatar id

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_ASSIGNABLE_MULTI_PROJECT_SEARCH_GET
manifest.displayName: get user assignable multi project search
manifest.shortDescription: get user assignable multi project search
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of users who fulfill both of these criteria:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_ASSIGNABLE_SEARCH_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of users that can be assigned to an issue. Use this method to find the list of users who can be assigned to:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_BULK_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns details of users specified in a list of usernames or keys. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission. Users with permission to access Jira can call this method, but empty search results are returned.

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_COLUMNS_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Resets the default issue table columns for the user to the system default. If a username is not passed, the calling user's default columns are reset. Permissions required:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_COLUMNS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the default issue table columns for the user. If a username is not passed in the request, the calling user's details are returned. Permissions required:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_COLUMNS_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets the default issue table columns for the user. If a username is not passed, the calling user's default columns are set. If no column details are sent, then all default columns are removed. The parameters for this resource are expressed as HTML form data. For example, in curl: curl -X PUT -d username=<username> -d columns=summary -d columns=description <url> Permissions required:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a user. Permissions required: Site administration (i.e., member of the site-admin group).

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a user. Permissions required: None.

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_GROUPS_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the groups to which a user belongs. Permissions required: Browse users and groups global permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_PERMISSION_SEARCH_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of users who fulfill both of these criteria:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_PICKER_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of users whose attributes match the query term. The returned object includes the html field where the matched query term is highlighted with the HTML strong tag. A list of account IDs can be provided to exclude users from the results. Permissions required: Browse users and groups global permission. Users with permission to access Jira can call this method, but will only get search results for an exact name match.

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a user. This resource is retained for legacy compatibility. As soon as a more suitable alternative is available this resource will be deprecated. The option is provided to set or generate a password for the user. When using the option to generate a password, by omitting password from the request, include \"notification\": \"true\" to ensure the user is sent an email advising them that their account has been created. This email includes a link for the user to set their password. If the notification isn't sent for a generated password, the user will need to be sent a reset password request from Jira. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_PROPERTIES_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the keys of all properties for a user. Permissions required:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a property from a user. Permissions required:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the value of a user's property. If no property key is provided Get user property keys is called. Permissions required:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_PROPERTIES_PROPERTY_KEY_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets the value of a user's property. Use this resource to store custom data against a user. Permissions required:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_SEARCH_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of users that match the search string and property. Permissions required: Browse users and groups global permission. Users with permission to access Jira can call this method, but empty search results are returned.

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_SEARCH_QUERY_GET
manifest.longDescription: Finds users using a structured query and returns user details. Permissions required: Browse users and groups global permission. The available queries statements are:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_SEARCH_QUERY_KEY_GET
manifest.longDescription: Finds users using a structured query and returns a list of user keys. Permissions required: Browse users and groups global permission. The available query statements are:

manifest.name: action.jira.USER_VIEWISSUE_SEARCH_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of users who fulfill both of these criteria:

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_ID_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a project version. Deprecated, use Delete and replace version that supports swapping version values in custom fields, in addition to the swapping for fixVersion and affectedVersion provided in this resource. Alternative versions can be provided to update issues that use the deleted version in fixVersion or affectedVersion. If alternatives are not provided, occurrences of fixVersion and affectedVersion that contain the deleted version are cleared. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission or Administer Projects project permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a project version. Permissions required: Browse projects project permission

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_ID_MERGETO_MOVE_ISSUES_TO_PUT
manifest.displayName: put version id mergeto move issues to
manifest.shortDescription: put version id mergeto move issues to
manifest.longDescription: Merges two project versions. The merge is completed by deleting the version specified in id and replacing any occurrences of its ID in fixVersion with the version ID specified in moveIssuesTo. Consider using Delete and replace version instead. This resource supports swapping version values in fixVersion, affectedVersion, and custom fields. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission or Administer Projects project permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_ID_MOVE_POST
manifest.longDescription: Modifies the version's sequence within the project, which affects the display order of the versions in Jira. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission or Administer Projects project permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_ID_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Modifies a project version. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission or Administer Projects project permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_ID_RELATED_ISSUE_COUNTS_GET
manifest.displayName: get version id related issue counts
manifest.shortDescription: get version id related issue counts
manifest.longDescription: Returns the following counts for a version:

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_ID_REMOVE_AND_SWAP_POST
manifest.displayName: post version id remove and swap
manifest.shortDescription: post version id remove and swap
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a project version. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission or Administer Projects project permission. Alternative versions can be provided to update issues that use the deleted version in fixVersion, affectedVersion, or any version picker custom fields. If alternatives are not provided, occurrences of fixVersion, affectedVersion, and any version picker custom field, that contain the deleted version, are cleared. Any replacement version must be in the same project as the version being deleted and cannot be the version being deleted.

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_ID_UNRESOLVED_ISSUE_COUNT_GET
manifest.displayName: get version id unresolved issue count
manifest.shortDescription: get version id unresolved issue count
manifest.longDescription: Returns counts of the issues and unresolved issues for the project version. Permissions required: Browse projects project permission

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a project version. Permissions required: Administer Jira global permission or Administer Projects project permission.

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_REMOTELINK_GET
manifest.longDescription: the global ID of the remote resource that is linked to the versions

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_VERSION_ID_REMOTELINK_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: The version for which to delete ALL existing remote version links

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_VERSION_ID_REMOTELINK_GET
manifest.longDescription: a String containing the version ID

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_VERSION_ID_REMOTELINK_GLOBAL_ID_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete version version id remotelink global id
manifest.shortDescription: delete version version id remotelink global id
manifest.longDescription: The version ID of the remote link

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_VERSION_ID_REMOTELINK_GLOBAL_ID_GET
manifest.displayName: get version version id remotelink global id
manifest.shortDescription: get version version id remotelink global id
manifest.longDescription: A REST sub-resource representing a remote version link

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_VERSION_ID_REMOTELINK_GLOBAL_ID_POST
manifest.displayName: post version version id remotelink global id
manifest.shortDescription: post version version id remotelink global id

manifest.name: action.jira.VERSION_VERSION_ID_REMOTELINK_POST
manifest.longDescription: Create a remote version link via POST. The link's global ID will be taken from the JSON payload if provided; otherwise, it will be generated.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOW_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns all workflows in Jira or a single workflow.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOW_TRANSITIONS_TRANSITION_ID_PROPERTIES_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete workflow transitions transition id properties
manifest.shortDescription: delete workflow transitions transition id properties
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a property from a workflow transition. Transition properties are used to change the behavior of a transition. For more information, see Transition properties and Workflow properties.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOW_TRANSITIONS_TRANSITION_ID_PROPERTIES_GET
manifest.displayName: get workflow transitions transition id properties
manifest.shortDescription: get workflow transitions transition id properties
manifest.longDescription: Returns the properties on a workflow transition. Transition properties are used to change the behavior of a transition. For more information, see Transition properties and Workflow properties.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOW_TRANSITIONS_TRANSITION_ID_PROPERTIES_POST
manifest.displayName: post workflow transitions transition id properties
manifest.shortDescription: post workflow transitions transition id properties
manifest.longDescription: Adds a property to a workflow transition. Transition properties are used to change the behavior of a transition. For more information, see Transition properties and Workflow properties.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOW_TRANSITIONS_TRANSITION_ID_PROPERTIES_PUT
manifest.displayName: put workflow transitions transition id properties
manifest.shortDescription: put workflow transitions transition id properties
manifest.longDescription: Updates a workflow transition by changing the property value. Trying to update a property that does not exist results in a new property being added to the transition. Transition properties are used to change the behavior of a transition. For more information, see Transition properties and Workflow properties.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_CREATEDRAFT_POST
manifest.longDescription: Create a draft workflow scheme from an active workflow scheme, by copying the active workflow scheme. Note that an active workflow scheme can only have one draft workflow scheme at any given time.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DEFAULT_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Resets the default workflow for a workflow scheme. That is, the default workflow is set to Jira's system workflow (the jira workflow).

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DEFAULT_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the default workflow for a workflow scheme. The default workflow is the workflow that is assigned any issue types that have not been mapped to any other workflow. The default workflow has All Unassigned Issue Types listed in its issue types for the workflow scheme in Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DEFAULT_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets the default workflow for a workflow scheme.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a workflow scheme. Note that a workflow scheme cannot be deleted if it is active (that is, being used by at least one project).

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_DEFAULT_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Resets the default workflow for a workflow scheme's draft. That is, the default workflow is set to Jira's system workflow (the jira workflow).

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_DEFAULT_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the default workflow for a workflow scheme's draft. The default workflow is the workflow that is assigned any issue types that have not been mapped to any other workflow. The default workflow has All Unassigned Issue Types listed in its issue types for the workflow scheme in Jira.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_DEFAULT_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets the default workflow for a workflow scheme's draft.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes a draft workflow scheme.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the draft workflow scheme for an active workflow scheme. Draft workflow schemes allow changes to be made to the active workflow schemes: When an active workflow scheme is updated, a draft copy is created. The draft is modified, then the changes in the draft are copied back to the active workflow scheme. See Configuring workflow schemes for more information.Note that:

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_ISSUETYPE_ISSUE_TYPE_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete workflowscheme id draft issuetype issue type
manifest.shortDescription: delete workflowscheme id draft issuetype issue type
manifest.longDescription: Deletes the issue type-workflow mapping for an issue type in a workflow scheme's draft.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_ISSUETYPE_ISSUE_TYPE_GET
manifest.displayName: get workflowscheme id draft issuetype issue type
manifest.shortDescription: get workflowscheme id draft issuetype issue type
manifest.longDescription: Returns the issue type-workflow mapping for an issue type in a workflow scheme's draft.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_ISSUETYPE_ISSUE_TYPE_PUT
manifest.displayName: put workflowscheme id draft issuetype issue type
manifest.shortDescription: put workflowscheme id draft issuetype issue type
manifest.longDescription: Sets the workflow for an issue type in a workflow scheme's draft.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Updates a draft workflow scheme. If a draft workflow scheme does not exist for the active workflow scheme, then a draft is created. Note that an active workflow scheme can only have one draft workflow scheme at any given time.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_WORKFLOW_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes the workflow-issue type mapping for a workflow in a workflow scheme's draft.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_WORKFLOW_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the workflow-issue type mappings for a workflow scheme's draft.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_DRAFT_WORKFLOW_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets the issue types for a workflow in a workflow scheme's draft. The workflow can also be set as the default workflow for the draft workflow scheme. Unmapped issues types are mapped to the default workflow.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a workflow scheme.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_ISSUETYPE_ISSUE_TYPE_DELETE
manifest.displayName: delete workflowscheme id issuetype issue type
manifest.shortDescription: delete workflowscheme id issuetype issue type
manifest.longDescription: Deletes the issue type-workflow mapping for an issue type in a workflow scheme.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_ISSUETYPE_ISSUE_TYPE_GET
manifest.displayName: get workflowscheme id issuetype issue type
manifest.shortDescription: get workflowscheme id issuetype issue type
manifest.longDescription: Returns the issue type-workflow mapping for an issue type in a workflow scheme.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_ISSUETYPE_ISSUE_TYPE_PUT
manifest.displayName: put workflowscheme id issuetype issue type
manifest.shortDescription: put workflowscheme id issuetype issue type
manifest.longDescription: Sets the workflow for an issue type in a workflow scheme.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Updates a workflow scheme, including the name, default workflow, issue type to project mappings, and more. If the workflow scheme is active (that is, being used by at least one project), then a draft workflow scheme is created or updated instead, provided that updateDraftIfNeeded is set to true.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_WORKFLOW_DELETE
manifest.longDescription: Deletes the workflow-issue type mapping for a workflow in a workflow scheme.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_WORKFLOW_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns the workflow-issue type mappings for a workflow scheme.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_ID_WORKFLOW_PUT
manifest.longDescription: Sets the issue types for a workflow in a workflow scheme. The workflow can also be set as the default workflow for the workflow scheme. Unmapped issues types are mapped to the default workflow.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKFLOWSCHEME_POST
manifest.longDescription: Creates a workflow scheme.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKLOG_DELETED_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of IDs and delete timestamps for worklogs deleted after a date and time.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKLOG_LIST_POST
manifest.longDescription: Returns worklog details for a list of worklog IDs.

manifest.name: action.jira.WORKLOG_UPDATED_GET
manifest.longDescription: Returns a list of IDs and update timestamps for worklogs updated after a date and time.
